alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 18 at 1:39PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, East Platte County, Goshen County, Central Carbon County, South Laramie Range Foothills, Central Laramie County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
